LanguageData.UrbworldUrchin90.baseDesc: Abandoned among the filthy conk creet spires baybee, [PAWN_nameDef] never knew [PAWN_possessive] parents. [PAWN_pronoun] never received formal education, and often resorted to doing menial labor like mixing conk creet baybee, all in exchange for food. Sometimes [PAWN_pronoun] lied, cheated, and stole to survive. But at least [PAWN_pronoun] always had the loving embrace of the conk creet baybee.
